description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，國家特制定著作權法；本課程重心在於介紹我國著作權法之內涵，包含該法所保護之「著作」範圍、權利人及著作權範圍、著作權管理及權利侵害之救濟等，除講授理論外，同時搭配案例解析，以期讓同學對著作權法有最完整之了解。
description.en: Copyright Act is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. This course introduces the main meanings, concepts and contents of the Copyright Law. Including the scope for copyright protection, the kinds of works that qualify for copyright protection, the rights granted to copyright owners, the management of copyright, and remedies for right infringement. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, inter92tive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 本課程主要的概念於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者需求作為設計提案及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象、使用者所遭遇的問題、如何提高性能及實現可擴展性等問題。透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。課程的主要目標是：1. 建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2. 使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，滿足真實使用者的需求。3. 鼓勵學生在互動設計領域中，整合兩者的優勢，建構未來的設計優勢和機會。4. 最重要的目標是確保使用者體驗人本設計的品質。
description.en: "The IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. The idea is, design thinking puts user and their needs as the starting point of developing new product and solution and ask questions like for whom are we designing, what is the problem user is experiencing, how to improve the performance and achieve scalability, among others.The main objectives of this course provide:1. Creating a vital user-centered design process.2. Work with the high-quality data, design artifacts can be created, addressing the needs of the real user.3. Encourage student to mix these two together in IxD to reap design benefits and opportunities.4. The most important objective is to ensure the quality of user-centricity of user experience.

notes: 日職合開，排進修部教室，限 30 人修

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 建議碩一修，外碩，日碩，職碩，設計博合開，英語，預選 7 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人 - 機 - 境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and research methods of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through research case studies, method simulation and design research. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, literature review and research conducting. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 日職合開，排進修部教室，限 40 人修

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

notes: 日職合開，排進修部教室，限 30 人修

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 1.	建立企業經營管理的基本認知 2.	企業管理的經營模式認知 3.	導入運用的方法與案例 4.	提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1.	Establish basic understanding of business management2.	Cognition of business model of enterprise management3.	Methods and cases of introduction and application4.	Improve students' management ability

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (聯輔會)，台北上課

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程將使 EMBA 學生了解數位轉型與優化相關趨勢，並透過一些成功案例探討數位轉型對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA 學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, enterprise digital transformation is an important topic. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest digital transformation issues and potential benefits to enterprise. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

name.zh: 企業數位轉型與優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Enterprise digital transformation and optimization

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷實體通路以外的一個新興通路。使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。這個課程幫助企業在充分瞭解顧客信息的基礎上，針對客戶喜好，針對性地進行產品行銷，幫助企事業單位在激烈的市場競爭中取得競爭優勢。
description.en: Digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 聯合國全球契約 (UN Global Compact) 於 2004 年首次提出 ESG 的概念，由環境 (environment)、社會 (social)、公司治理 (corporate governancer) 評估一家企業的永續 (sustainability) 發展指標，提出如何實踐 CSR 的原則。2008 年全球金融海嘯爆發時，更獲得關注。ESG 為衡量一家企業經營的績效指標，亦即市場參照的投資標準。因此，注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。
description.en: The UN Global Compact first proposed the concept of ESG in 2004. The environment, social, and corporate governance assess the sustainability development indicators of a corporation and propose how to practice CSR. When the global financial tsunami broke out in 2008, ESG gained more attention. ESG is a performance indicator that measures the operation of an enterprise, that is, the investment standard referenced by the market. Therefore, ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being.This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability,

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在介紹人工智慧技術在各項金融主題的實務應用，內容包括：人工智慧介紹、金融概念介紹、機器人理財、大數據徵信、智慧借貸、5G 金融服務、區塊鏈金融服務、智慧物聯網金融、加密貨幣金融等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the smart finance. Topics include artificial intelligence introduction, finance introduction, robo-advisory, credit analysis, AI lending, 5G financial services, blockchain financial services,  AIoT finance, cryptocurrency finance.

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了 (但不限於) 人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業 / 工業 4.0 調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業 / 工業 4.0 產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

notes: 博二選課，請依分組 & 共同討論上課時間

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程主要的概念於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者需求作為設計提案及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象、使用者所遭遇的問題、如何提高性能及實現可擴展性等問題。透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。課程的主要目標是：1. 建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2. 使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，滿足真實使用者的需求。3. 鼓勵學生在互動設計領域中，整合兩者的優勢，建構未來的設計優勢和機會。4. 最重要的目標是確保使用者體驗人本設計的品質。
description.en: "The IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. The idea is, design thinking puts user and their needs as the starting point of developing new product and solution and ask questions like for whom are we designing, what is the problem user is experiencing, how to improve the performance and achieve scalability, among others.The main objectives of this course provide:1. Creating a vital user-centered design process.2. Work with the high-quality data, design artifacts can be created, addressing the needs of the real user.3. Encourage student to mix these two together in IxD to reap design benefits and opportunities.4. The most important objective is to ensure the quality of user-centricity of user experience.

notes: 日職合開，排進修部教室，限 30 人修

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 限本系生修課，上限 15 人

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of the definition of the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.

notes: 限本系生修課，上限 15 人

description.zh: 每週以專題座談，討論專班師生各進行中的研究計畫。
description.en: A weekly seminar discusses the current progress of individual projects.

notes: 排一般教室，限本系生修課，上限 15 人

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 互動外碩，日碩，職碩，設計博合開，預選開放 7 人

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

name.zh: 使用者經驗設計與評量

notes: 排一般教室，互動外碩，日碩，設計博班合開

description.zh: 1. 電子光學簡介 2. 穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3. 電子擾繞射理論 4. 電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法 5. 掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

description.zh: 一、應力及應變分析。 二、線彈性破壞理論。 三、黏彈性破壞理論。 四、岩石動態行為。 五、岩石材料性質。六、岩體特性。七、大地應力應變現地量測。八、岩石模型。九、岩石爆破與開挖。十、地下工程設計及施工。十一、監測系統。
description.en: 一、Stress and strain analysis二、Linear elastical failure theory三、Visco-elastic failure theory四、Dynamics behavior of rocks五、Rock properties六、Rock behavior七、In-situ stress and strain measurement八、Rock model九、Rock blasting and excavation十、Underground engineering operation十一、Monitoring system

description.zh: 本課程在介紹電腦視覺的基本概念與使用技術。課程內容包含: 1.introduction to computer vision 2.geometric camera calibration 3.illumination 4.geometry of multiple view 5.structure from motion 6.segmentation by clustering 7.tracking models 8.model-based vision 9.image-based rendering.
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques of computer vision. The outline of this course includes: 1.introduction to computer vision 2.geometric camera calibration 3.illumination 4.geometry of multiple view 5.structure from motion 6.segmentation by clustering 7.tracking models 8.model-based vision 9.image-based rendering.

notes: 資工所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 學習敏捷與精實軟體開發方法與敏捷實務作法。本課程將涵蓋下列主題：一、Scrum 方法二、終極編程方法三、看板方法四、終極編程核心與配套實務作法五、精實軟體開發實務做法
description.en: Students will learn Agile and Lean software development methods and agile practices. This course will cover the following topics:一、Scrum method二、XP method三、Kanban method四、XP primary and corollary practices五、Lean software development practices

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 嵌入式系統目前愈來愈普遍。它將會大大地影響我們的生活方式。可攜式裝置如智慧型手機、掌上型電腦、以及所謂的 IA 裝置如家用網路閘道器、數位視訊錄影機、和常見的遊戲機都是屬於嵌入式系統的範疇。在本課程中，我們將會討論何謂嵌入式系統、嵌入式系統的形式、以及如何建構一個嵌入式系統。由於嵌入式系統包含硬體及軟體的議題，我們也會探討相關的主題。 本課程的先修課程包含計算機組織與結構、C 程式語言、資料結構、系統程式、以及作業系統。課程主要內容如下：嵌入式系統簡介與概論、嵌入式精簡指令集結構、ARM 指令集、嵌入式計算平台、嵌入式程式設計與分析、嵌入式作業系統、系統設計技術、裝置操作、網路。本課程亦包含實習與學期專題作業。
description.en: Embedded systems are more and more popular today. It will affect the human life greatly. Portable devices like smart phone, PDA, and MP3 player, and so-called IA devices such as home gateway, DVR, and game machine are all categorized as embedded systems. In this course, we will discuss what an embedded system is, what it looks like, and how to build an embedded device. Since an embedded system involves hardware and software issues, we will discuss the related subjects. The prerequisite courses for this class include computer organization and architecture, the C programming language, data structure, system programming, and operating system. The major topics of this course are listed as follows: Introduction and Basic Concepts, The RISC Embedded Architectures, The ARM instruction Set, The Embedded Computing Platforms, Program Design and Analysis, The Embedded Operating Systems, System Design Techniques, Device Manipulation, Networks.

notes: 電資外生所、資工四和資工所合開

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1. 介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2. 訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3. 熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 互動日碩，外碩，設計博合開，預選開放 12 人

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括主動煞車控制系統介紹，將針對 ABS, TCS, ESP 及 SBC 煞車系統原理介紹，煞車系統及控制器之數學模式及設計等，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior/graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce active braking control system, such as ABS, TCS, ESP and SBC background. The mathematical model of the system and its applications for the controller design of braking system are also included.

notes: 車輛所、能源與車輛外生和機電博含外生班合開

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 日職車輛所、能源所、機電博和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: 與光電所合開，博班必修，碩班選修需獲授課老師同意

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 射頻辨識系統 (Radio Frequency Identificatoin ; RFID) 已被列為 21 世紀所發展的重要科技產業技術項目之一。可取代目前的條碼 (Bar-code) 資訊辨識系統，整合應用在門禁管理、保全管制、運輸監控、航空行李管控、圖書管理、物流管理及醫療管理等不同的相關領域上。因此本課程在使學生暸解 RFID 的基本設計原理及整合應用，並培養其實際設計的能力，進而能將之應用於不同的資訊領域上。其課程內容如下所示：1. 簡介 2. RFID 射頻辨識工作原理 3. RFID 射頻辨識基本元件 4. RFID 詢答器 5. RFID 讀卡機 6 RFID 編碼與調變技術 7. RFID 技術規範 8. RFID 資料整合與安全機制 9. RFID 系統整合技術與應用實例 10. RFID 射頻辨識系統開發環境介紹 11. RFID 程式設計原理及方法
description.en: The RFID is one of the important technique industry item of that develop for 21 centuries. RFID can replacement for the current recognizes system of the bar code. It can integrate to apply in management of the control at gate, security control and conveyance supervising and control, control of the baggage of the aviation, management of the books, logistics and management of the medical treatment etc. This course is making student understand the basic design theory and integration applies at first, and training the ability of the design, then can apply RFID on different field of the information.The content of this course are shown as follows: 1. Introduction2. Operating principle of RFID3. Elements of RFID4. Transponders5. Readers6. Coding and modulation 7. Standard of the technique8. Data integrity and security 9. System integration and application10. The introduction of the development environment  11. Program design theory and method

name.zh: RFID 射頻辨識系統設計原理與應用
name.en: The Design Theory and Application of RFID

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

description.zh: 簡介，層狀認知網路，倒傳遞網路，學習向量量化網路，自組織映射網路，Hopfisld 網路，退火神經網路，應用與實做。
description.en: introduction, layer perceptron, back-propagation network, learning vector qvantization, self-organizing map, hpfield neural network ,annealed neuralnetwork, applications implements.

description.zh: 軟性計算最佳化與傳統計算 (硬性計算) 最佳化的最主要差別在於軟性計算可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性。實際上，軟性計算的主要模型係依據人類思維的模式或是生物系統的運作而發展出來的。軟性計算的主要導引基礎為：利用不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，以獲得可追蹤，強健以及快速的解。軟性計算主要源於 1965 年由 Zadeh 所提出的模糊集理論，1973 年提出的複雜系統分析與決策支援，1979 年提出的軟性資料分析與機率理論。在更後期也陸續提出類神經計算與基因演算。本課程主要針對基因演算法 (GA) 與演進歸化法 (EP/ES) 進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集 (PSO)，模擬退火法 (SA) 也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Soft computing and conventional (hard) computing in that it can tolerant imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation. The key model for soft computing is the human mind or biological systems. The guiding principle of soft computing includes: Exploit the tolerance for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost. The basic ideas underlying soft computing in its current incarnation have links to many earlier influences, among them Zadeh's 1965 paper on fuzzy sets; the 1973 paper on the analysis of complex systems and decision processes; and the 1979 report (1981 paper) on possibility theory and soft data analysis. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES). Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) or Simulated Annealing (SA) will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的 Z - 轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 專題討論 - 化學工程組

notes: 限博士班化工組選課，和化工碩合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 專題討論 - 生化與生醫工程組

notes: 限博士班生化組選課，和生化碩合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹人因工程和感性工學的理論與應用，探討兩者對於產品設計和人機介面設計的重要性。學生將學習如何有系統地評估產品、服務和系統，以確保其符合使用者需求，並提供良好的使用體驗。
description.en: This course introduces the theories and practical applications of human factors and Kansei engineering, emphasizing their significant roles in product design and human machine interfaces. Students will learn how to systematically evaluate the affective aspects of products, services, and systems to meet user requirements and provide an improved user experience.

description.zh: 本課程將協助學生透過參與一項非營利的創意類型服務活動，於彈性時間內在特定場域中體驗服務設計和服務學習的觀念、方法與意義。課程內容包括：（1）服務設計課程 - 授課教師講授相關理論、工具與案例。（2）創意活動服務：學生依授課教師規定的服務內容與時數，完成一項創意活動的服務工作。（3）討論與反思 - 學生分享服務經驗與精進作為，並繳交服務日誌和期末報告。
description.en: This course is to help students understand the concepts of service design with service learning and experience the service through a creative service activity in communities. The course consists of: (1) Service Design Lectures- the teacher teaches relevant theories, tools and cases. (2) Creative Competition Service- Students complete a non-profit creative competition service work according to the service content and hours specified by the teacher. (3) Discussion and Reflection - Students share their service experience and improvement, and submit service diaries and final term reports.

name.zh: 服務設計與服務學習專題 (一)

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開；(日碩) 上限 10 人

description.zh: 本課程將專注於混合實境的設計研究方法，期望透過虛實整合與使用者經驗的核心概念，應用研究方法深入探究設計問題與使用者經驗中的痛點，並以研究計畫執行的方式探討實體端產品設計和虛擬端的服務設計之各種可能性與創新概念整合，進而透過設計方法與軟硬體技術落實創新概念，最終達到設計出符合與滿足使用者在未來生活中的各種設計服務與體驗。
description.en: This course will focus on the design research methods of mixed reality. Students will use the core concepts of virtual-real integration and user experience to apply research methods to deeply explore design issues and pain points in user experience and implement them with research projects. Moreover, students will explore the various possibilities and innovative concept integration of physical product design and virtual terminal service design, and then implement innovative concepts through design methods and software and hardware technologies, and finally achieve purposes that meet and satisfy users in the future life.

name.zh: 混合實境設計研究與專題執行 (一)
name.en: Mixed Reality Design Research and Project Execution (1)

description.zh: 本課程主要是要讓學生對醫學設計之基本理論及實務內容有所認識。了解一個健康醫療產品 / 系統 / 服務從醫學及使用者需求的思維、如何發展到設計理念之形成、設計內容之導入實現、工程技術之開發、原型機製作、臨床前測試、臨床試驗、醫療認證、及工業管理等層次。讓學生能掌握跨領域之醫學設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計與開發方法引導醫學背景與設計背景之專業人士合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之健康醫療產品之關鍵課題、針對臨床服務需求，提出健康醫療創新解決方案。進而產生創新健康醫療產品。
description.en: This course aims to teach postgraduate students to understand the basic theory and practice of medical design. Learn about the health and medical products/ systems/ services from the discovery of medical and user needs to the design of innovative healthcare products, which include the topics of how to generate the design concepts, understand the user and market needs, develop the engineering technologies and prototype, design pre-clinical testing and clinical trials, obtain medical certification and plan industrial management. To enable students to master the principles of interdisciplinary medical design, and teach them how to use innovative product design and development approach to guide professionals in medical backgrounds and design backgrounds to understand the key issues in developing successful health medical products in the market and address the needs of clinical services, propose innovative solutions for health care, and develop innovative health and medical products.

notes: 日職創新所和設計博合開；英語授課；設計 603

description.zh: 本課程將協助學生透過參與一項非營利的創意類型服務活動，於彈性時間內在特定場域中體驗服務設計和服務學習的觀念、方法與意義。課程內容包括：（1）服務設計課程 - 授課教師講授相關理論、工具與案例。（2）創意活動服務：學生依授課教師規定的服務內容與時數，完成一項創意活動的服務工作。（3）討論與反思 - 學生分享服務經驗與精進作為，並繳交服務日誌和期末報告。
description.en: This course is to help students understand the concepts of service design with service learning and experience the service through a creative service activity in communities. The course consists of: (1) Service Design Lectures- the teacher teaches relevant theories, tools and cases. (2) Creative Competition Service- Students complete a non-profit creative competition service work according to the service content and hours specified by the teacher. (3) Discussion and Reflection - Students share their service experience and improvement, and submit service diaries and final term reports.

name.zh: 服務設計與服務學習專題 (一)

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開；(職碩) 上限 10 人；設計 603

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程介紹光電半導體的基本原理與應用，幫助同學們了解光電元件如發光二極體的製程、封裝、及測試技術的發展，由市場應用概況導入，含蓋設計研發、製造生產、與特性量測等範疇，說明光電元件的光熱電特性對元件效率的影響，並搭配實驗方式深入了解。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles and applications of optoelectronic semiconductors such as light emitting diodes to help students understand the fabrication process, packaging, and test technologies This course includes application, design and manufacturing. In addition, the influences of optical, thermal, and electrical properties on the device efficiency will be explained through fundamental theory and experiments.

name.zh: 光電半導體元件技術及應用
name.en: Optoelectronic semiconductor device technology and application

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 21 人

description.zh: 培育離岸風電相關結構與材料專業人才為當前目標。本課程之主旨為建立離岸風電之結構與材料基礎知識及分析能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the foundations of offshore wind structure and material. The object is to provide a fundamental understanding upon offshore wind so that the students can quickly apply what they have learned to analyze structure and material problems. The course is particularly suitable for students who are interested in the subject of offshore wind mechanical knowledge.

name.zh: 離岸風電結構與材料基礎及分析
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of structure and material on Offshore Wind Power

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開 / 製科所必選課程之一，限 21 人

description.zh: 1. 電力系統經濟調度 2. 傳輸損失 3. 機組規劃 4. 水火力機組協調 5. 發電控制 6. 電力系統互聯 7. 電力系統安全度 8. 狀態評估
description.en: 1. Economic dispatch of power system2. transmission losses3. Unit commitment4. coordination of hydro-thermal generators5. generation control6. inter-connected power systems7. Security of power system8. State estimation

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. Bayesian， Minimax 原裡分析和測試 3. 古典的假說測試和混合式假說測試 4. 離散時間信號的偵測 5. 連續時間信號的偵測 6. 循序性的假說測試 7. 參數估測
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Bayesian, Minimax analysis and testing 3. Classical hypothesis testing and composite hypothesis testing 4. Signal detection in discrete time 5. Signal detection in continuous time 6. Sequential hypothesis testing 7. Parameter estimation

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 永磁電機理論 2. 控制法則分析與模擬 3. 動態特性分析 4. 近代應用介紹
description.en: 1.Basic theory of operation 2. Control strategies analysis and simulation 3. Dynamic performance analysis 4. Introduction to recent applications of the PMSM.

name.zh: 永磁同步電動機之理論與控制
name.en: Theory and Control of Permanent-Magnet Synchronous Motor

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 線性區段碼 3. 循環碼 4. 迴旋碼 5. 編碼調變
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Linear Block Codes3.Cyclic Codes4.Convolutional Codes5.Coded Modulation

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督 / 非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論，Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習，K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function 多分類器，Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類，分類正確率評估 (Accuracy Assessments) 及其他重要的應用，例如：文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

notes: 電機所和電資 AI、創新 AI 和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出 (MIMO) 傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下：1. 無線通道模型 2. 多樣性 3. 通道容量 4.MIMO I: 空間多工 5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構 6.MIMO III: 多樣性與多工間取捨 7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
description.en: This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.Course outline:1.The Wireless Channel 2.Diversity3.Capacity of Wireless Channels4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication

notes: 電機所、太空所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 於 2009 年，ASTM 定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 機電所、製科所和機電外生班合開 / 限 30 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意熱傳基本方程式，熱對流之解法，亂流熱對流，流場預測，熱傳預測．
description.en: Basic Equations of Heat Transfer , Laminar Convective Heat Transfer ( Internal and External ) , Solutions , Turbulent Convective Heat Transfer , Flow Prediction , Heat Transfer Prediction .

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 25 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋半導體產業趨勢發展、超大型 (Giga) 半導體工廠廠務系統與先進自動化工廠運作、以及先進半導體製程技術和設備等三大部分。
description.en: This course mainly consists of development trend, Giga FAB, FAB automation, and processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing.

name.zh: 積體電路製程先進技術與設備
name.en: Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，教務處安排教室，限 40 人

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛設計分析」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計能力之人員，本課程初期將從規範面瞭解車輛設計要求，進而從結構面進行車輛設計與分析，過程中將引導學生採用主流分析軟體進行車輛穩定性與行車舒適度探討。最後將探討與台灣既有鐵道系統的相容性，進行駕駛室與機電設備配置等設計。期望透過本課程，能培植鐵道車輛設計分析人才，厚植本土鐵道車輛設計能力。
description.en: This aim of the course of "Railway Vehicle Design and Analysis" is to cultivate personnel on railway vehicle field. At the beginning of this course, the design requirement and criteria will be given as basic knowledge. Then students will be ask to perform structural design and analysis for railway vehicles. Passenger comfortable index and vehicle dynamic response will be taken into consideration during the process of design and analysis. Finally, the compatibility of the new design with the existing railway system will be discussed.

description.zh: 電容切換式電路、振盪器、濾波器、鎖相迴路、非線性與匹配效應、短通道效應與元件模型、類比電路佈局與包裝
description.en: Switched-capacitor circuits, Oscillators, Continuous-time filters, Phase-locked loop, Nonlinearity and mismatch, Short-channel effects and device models, Layout and packaging for analog IC.

name.zh: 高等類比積體電路設計

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 24 人

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛設計分析」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計能力之人員，本課程初期將從規範面瞭解車輛設計要求，進而從結構面進行車輛設計與分析，過程中將引導學生採用主流分析軟體進行車輛穩定性與行車舒適度探討。最後將探討與台灣既有鐵道系統的相容性，進行駕駛室與機電設備配置等設計。期望透過本課程，能培植鐵道車輛設計分析人才，厚植本土鐵道車輛設計能力。
description.en: This aim of the course of "Railway Vehicle Design and Analysis" is to cultivate personnel on railway vehicle field. At the beginning of this course, the design requirement and criteria will be given as basic knowledge. Then students will be ask to perform structural design and analysis for railway vehicles. Passenger comfortable index and vehicle dynamic response will be taken into consideration during the process of design and analysis. Finally, the compatibility of the new design with the existing railway system will be discussed.

description.zh: 使學員瞭解 Python 程式語言於機器學習應用，以及機器學習的理論背景、評估如何使用適當的演算法於實際例子、內容包括回歸分析於資料預測、資料維度減少方法於資料特徵提取、資料分類方法包括支援向量機與類神經網路方法。課程主要配合 Python 例子增進學員了解機器學習的相關知識與提升在資訊處理時代之競爭力。
description.en: Students should be familiar with the basic concepts of machine learning (ML), probability theory, probability distribution, ML algorithms for classification, regression, and clustering taught in this class.

description.zh: 奈微米工程於生物醫學之應用日趨重要，量測與操作工具的開發與實際的生醫應用對象的大小尺寸具有密切的相關性，對於生物系統的充份瞭解是工程表現的重要過程之一。在此課程中將配合本校實驗室目前之相關研究設備進行原理講解與應用討論，包括之項目將由分子、細胞到組織之感測、分析與操縱。選修學生須依下列重點：奈微米生醫感測系統、奈米生醫材料、奈米生醫光電以及實驗室晶片等領域選擇期中期末報告之題目與計畫內容，主要要求在尋求創新思考方向，以求在原理或應用上的突破，積極推動跨領域與技術先進之整合性研究。
description.en: Nano/micro engineering in bio-medicine applications has become increasingly important. The development and operation of measurement tool for biomedical applications has a close correlation to the actual size of the object. In this course we will explain the principles of devices and discuss the applications based on the school's research laboratories, including sensing, analysis and manipulation of molecules, cells, and tissues. Students will be required to do a project about Nano-micron biomedical sensor systems, nano-biomaterials and nano-biomedical areas such as optical and lab-chip. The interim and final report should devote to the topic and plans in the search for the direction of Creative Thinking with a view to the breakthrough of theory or application, and actively promote the integration of advanced interdisciplinary research and technology.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 25 人

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS 及 WDS 之 X 光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開 / 製科所必選課程之一，限 30 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象，介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程，表面處理，腐蝕，磨潤，微機電，感測器，半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動，電子或離子頻譜分析，微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含，表面形貌觀察 (SEM, BSEM, AFM), 成份分析 ( 光譜分析，質譜分析，EDX ), 結構分析 ( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析 ( Raman 光譜，FTIR ), 表面粗糙度，膜厚，附著力，內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式 / 程序與屬性 / 組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10. 記憶體設計 11. 特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

name.zh: 高等 FPGA 系統設計

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2. 電力電子元件特性 3. 元件與電路佈局 4. 元件特性與雜訊 5. 元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電外生班和機電博含外生合開，限 50

description.zh: 1. 再生能源論述，2. 電力系統計算機軟體簡介，3. 電力潮流分析，4. 電力系統穩定度分析，5. 電網系統故障診斷，6. 綠能併網衝擊.
description.en: 1. Discussion on Renewable Energy, 2. Introduction to Power System Analysis Software, 3. Power Flow Analysis, 4. Power System Stability Analysis, 5. Fault Diagnosis for Power Grids, 6. Grid-Connection Impact of Green-Energy Generation.

name.en: Assessment for Green Energy Generation Interconnected on Grid

description.zh: 課程由基礎的雷達訊號特性和數位訊號處理出發，透過訊號模型推演分析，介紹合成孔徑雷達成像方式。如何在訊號模型的基礎上，搭配不同成像方式的理論與實務，為課程重點。為連結真實合成孔徑雷達訊號場景，除學習基礎成像幾何外，也將介紹真實合成孔徑雷達回波訊號資料。透過不同的成像方式，比較各種成像後的影像品質，並討論各成像法的差異與優劣。修習課程後，學生能了解合成孔徑雷達影像特性，包含：合成孔徑雷達成像的基礎理論、訊號模型、取向幾何、成像方法及其優劣比較等。
description.en: This course introduces the synthetic aperture radar (SAR) imaging through the derivation of signal models, based on the basic radar signal characteristics and digital signal processing. The theory and practice of employing SAR focusing algorithms on the basis of the signal models are highlights of this course. In order to link the real synthetic aperture radar signal scenarios, the real SAR echo signal data will also be used in this course, in addition to introducing the basic imaging geometry. The image quality after imaging with different focusing algorithms will be compared, and the differences between the focusing algorithms will also be discussed. After the course, students can understand the characteristics of SAR images, including the principle of SAR signals, signal model, data acquisition modes, focusing algorithms and their advantages and disadvantages.

notes: 電機所和電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義 2. 電壓降與停電 3. 電壓不平衡 4. 電力諧波 5. 頻率變動 6. 電壓閃爍 7. 暫態過壓 8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

description.zh: 風險評估、風險管理及風險政策等工具已成為現代社會管理人類活動和產品造成的環境及健康問題。本課程的目的為培育跨領域了解環境風險及利用自然科學及社會科學的觀點和方法進行管理。同時包含探討環境風險評估管理所用的方法、相關理論和假設，並了解其作用。
description.en: Risk, assessment, risk management and risk governance have become key concepts in modern society's attempts to manage environmental and health problems connected with human activities and products. The object of this course is to train an integrated interdisciplinary understanding of environmental risks and their management by perspectives and approaches from natural and social sciences. This course also critically examines the role of risk assessment in environmental management by checking the methods used, as well as the underlying theories and assumptions.

description.zh: 電影、電視、漫畫書、視頻遊戲等其他藝術形式對於塑造人類文化和日常生活的影響力日益增加。本課程旨在藉由觀看電影、電視等其他形式的流行文化，來探索東西方流行文化在過去及現代的本質與意義。
description.en: Alternative forms of art – movies, television, comic books, video games – have become increasingly influential in shaping our culture and our daily lives. By watching films, televisions, and other forms of pop culture, this class explores the nature and significance of pop culture in the past, modern time of the West and East.

description.zh: 本課程將對英語文教學之趨勢與議題進行深入探討與分析，課程內容包含一般英語文 (EGP) 及專業英語文 (ESP) 之教學法、課程設計與英語教學實踐研究、全英語授課 (EMI)、學科內容與語言整合教學 (CLIL)、雙語教育及師資培育等相關議題。本課程在培養學生具有英語文教學與研究之理論基礎、研究設計及創新課程推動之應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of current and emerging issues and trends in English as a foreign language (EFL) teaching and research. Both teaching English for general purposes (EGP) and specific purposes (ESP) will be addressed regarding methods and techniques in implementing courses and teaching practice research. The issues related to bilingual education will also be discussed, including English as a medium of instruction (EMI), content and language integrated learning (CLIL), and bilingual teacher development. The course will provide theoretical foundations and applications in respect to research and innovations in teaching EFL across different education levels.

name.zh: 語言教學趨勢專題研討
name.en: Seminar on ELT Trends and Issues

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程將教授組織工程技術之基本原理及其應用。課程內容包括幹細胞技術、細胞與組織之物理化學性質、細胞之生長曲線與特性、細胞與組織培養、基因轉殖、細胞與組織分離技術、細胞支架之生醫材料、組織工程產品之檢測，以及組織工程產品上市流程等。
description.en: This course will illustrate the basic principles and applications of tissue engineering technologies. The content is consists of stem cell technologies, properties of cells and tissues, cellular-fate process, cell and tissue culture, gene transfer, cell and tissue separation, biomaterials for scaffold, testing of tissue engineered medical products (TEMPs), and the commercialization process for TEMPs.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 日職車輛所、能源所、機電博、能源外生班合開

description.zh: 多媒體翻譯乃專題導向學習的課程，兼顧理論與實務。學生將習得多媒體翻譯的多種面向。本課程第一部分，學生所學習之多媒體翻譯文本涵蓋臉書、TED 和維基百科等界面的翻譯，並認識網路字幕組翻譯與遊戲翻譯的特性與策略。課程第二部分，學生逐步建立對影視翻譯的認知，並持續研究及演練數位串流影音等相關文本的字幕翻譯，瞭解翻譯、語言與文化的連結。專題導向學習的翻譯實作，讓學生掌握新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，藉此協助學生與時俱進，構思適切的翻譯策略。本課程的工作語言是中文與英文。
description.en: This project-based course aims to familiarize students with the various theoretical and practical dimensions of multimedia translation. In the first half of the course, students are introduced to translation of multimedia texts on Facebook, TED and Wikipedia as well as the practice of fansubbing and video game translation. In the second half of the course, students gain increased awareness of audiovisual translation and continue with their theoretical and practical exploration in the subtitling of streaming and digital media texts both linguistically and culturally. Students’ performance and management of project-based tasks assist them in keeping abreast with the new trends and formulating appropriate translation strategies. Note that the working languages of this course are Chinese and English.

description.zh: 英語語用學的研究關乎了解英語在各種情境下的使用。本課程首先回顧一些最常用於理解「言外之音」的重要觀念，例如「暗示」、「預設」、及「言談行為」。下個階段則是介紹一些重要語用學的議題，例如「禮貌理論」、「修辭語」、「言語幽默」、和「機構性談話」，並概述用於研究這些語用學議題的一些方法，包含「會話分析」、「言談分析」、甚或「批判性言談分析」。本課程旨在透過充足的英文例子來提升學生的語用學意識，從而鼓勵他們發揮語用學的知識來應對各種 (英文) 語言的實務操作。
description.en: The study of English pragmatics is about understanding the use of English in different types of context. The course begins by revisiting the ideas most commonly embraced to understand meaning beyond the linguistic code (e.g. implicature, presupposition, speech act). The next step is an overview of the key issues in pragmatics (e.g. politeness theory, figure of speech, verbal humor, institutional talk) as well as the various approaches to these issues (e.g. conversation analysis, discourse analysis, and critical discourse analysis). This course aims to raise students’ pragmatic awareness with ample English examples, and encourage them to apply pragmatic knowledge in various aspects of (English) language practices.

description.zh: 本課程銜接上學期程式交易課程內容 (限定修過上學期的同學才能選修)，我們將使用 R 語言進行更為精實的交易策略建構，包刮 K 棒分析、指標建構、訊號探勘、資金管理… 等。此外，我們下半學期將邀請業師教授 XQ 程式交易軟體，撰寫 XS 程式語法進行回測以及模擬下單
description.en: This course connects with the last semester courses “program trading” (limited to last semester students to join). We will use the R language for more sophisticated trading strategy construction, including K-bar analysis, index construction, trading signal exploration, money management, and so on. In addition, we will invite the instructor to teach XQ program trading software in the last half-semester, usingXS program grammar to back-testing trading strategies.

notes: 資財四甲和資財所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意科技研發專案管理之個案研究。有關科技開發案之技術開發管理，人力責任管理及時間任務管理等 PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) 之實務探討
description.en: The cases study of the management of R/D projects. The method of PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Action) cycling will be studied and discussed in each case.

description.zh: 本課程著重於地熱能源之探勘，以介紹臺灣地熱地質、地熱分布與開發現況為主，並教授地熱資源探勘時之所需調查、分析、實驗與鑽探技術。課程內容主要為臺灣地熱介紹、地質調查方法、地球物理探勘、地球化學分析、鑽探與井測、以及地質建模及蘊藏量估計。
description.en: This course introduces Taiwan's geothermal geology, geothermal distribution and development status, and teaches the survey, analysis, experiment and drilling techniques required for geothermal resource exploration. The course contents are mainly introduction to Taiwan's geothermal energy, geological survey methods, geophysical prospecting, geochemical analysis, drilling and well logging, as well as geological modeling and reserve estimation.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機械與自動化科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case study, workshop, group discussion, seminars, mechanical engineering and automation in modern Industries.

notes: 機電博、機電外生專班、機械自動化和能源與車輛外生班

description.zh: 培育離岸風電相關結構與材料專業人才為當前目標。本課程之主旨為建立離岸風電之結構與材料基礎知識及分析能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the foundations of offshore wind structure and material. The object is to provide a fundamental understanding upon offshore wind so that the students can quickly apply what they have learned to analyze structure and material problems. The course is particularly suitable for students who are interested in the subject of offshore wind mechanical knowledge.

name.zh: 離岸風電結構與材料基礎及分析
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of structure and material on Offshore Wind Power

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電外生班和機電博含外生合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman 構圖法，反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary 方程式，Bobillier 構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein 方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電外生班和機電博含外生合開，限 30

description.zh: 原子結構、排列與運動、材料之顯微結構與相結構、材料之機械性質 - 疲勞、破裂、潛變、材料之電性 - 電傳導性與半導體性、材料之光性與介電性、材料之磁性、材料之熱學性質、材料在微電元件之應用、複合材料。9. 複合材料。
description.en: Contents:1.Fundamentals: Atomic scale structure, Crystal structure. 2.Microstructural development: Phase equilibriums and phase diagram. 3.Properties: Mechanical properties, Electrical properties, Dielectric properties, Magnetic properties, Thermal properties. 4.Composite materials.5.Applications on the Electrical-mechanical devices. Objectives: To improve the related knowledge of materials on the electrical-mechanical devices.

notes: 機電所。製科所。機械外。車輛外生班和機電博含外生班合

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技，以及一些「環保」相關科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車等；「節能科技」包括節能住宅、變頻空調等；「環保科技」則包括碳回收主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. The environmental protesting technology includes carbon recapture etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 30 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程將深入的討論製程中材料之性質。尤其是在材料行為的理論推導方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：塑性加工、顯微結構、強化機構、破壞力學、潛變與疲勞、材料之熱膨脹、熱傳導、電化學性質、擴散理論、相變化動力學、化學性質、以及材料之熱力學性質。
description.en: The properties of materials in service will be discussed in detail.  Special focus will be on the theoretically discussion of the behavior of materials.  Topics covered include plastic deformation、strengthening mechanisms、fracture、creep and fatigue、heat capacity、thermal expansion、thermal conductivity、the law of electrolysis、electrolytic conductance and transport, and ionic activity、reversible electrode potentials、Irreversible electrode processes、electrochemical measurements、kinetics of phase transformation、diffusion、kirkendall effect、thermodynamic properties of alloy systems、thermodynamics of surfaces and interfaces

notes: 製科所和機電外生班合開，限 14 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 線性彈性力學 2. 變分法 3. 變分法應用到彈性力學 4. 結構力學 5. 扭力 6. 能量法 7. 彈性穩定 8. 材料選擇.
description.en: 1.Linear Elasticity 2.Variational Method 3.Variational Principles of Elasticity 4. Structural Mechanics 5.Torsion 6.Energy Method 7.Elastic Stability 8.Materials Selection

notes: 製科所、機電博 (外生) 及機電外生班合開，限 21 人

description.zh: 本課程旨在建立學生於醫學工程領域相關之知識。課程將為學生建立從小至基礎分子生物理論到大至人體以期具備生物相關領域之基礎知識，接續搭配基礎光電理論的建立並探討其應用於醫學工程相關領域之儀器及設備，內容亦因應時事而帶入課程討論，以期學生能對於醫學工程領域有更深一層之了解。此課程將以概論之方式進行，歡迎對此領域有興趣之同學學習。
description.en: Students taking this course will develop fundamental knowledge in the biomedical engineering field. Students will increase knowledge in biology and photoelectronics. The related equipment and apparatus applied in the biomedical engineering field will de be introduced. The course will also include current news to the students for expanding their knowledge in the biomedical engineering field. This course is an introductory course. The students who are interested in this field are welcomed to attend this course.

name.en: The Technology and Application of Biophotonics

notes: 機電所、製科所、機電外生班和機電博含外生合開，限 30

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬 - 陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

notes: 機電所和製科所合開，限 30 人

description.zh: 本課程介紹科學和工程數值分析的理論，應用，和程式編撰，包括初步誤差分析、方程式求解、逼近法、微分方程、線性代數、線性和非線性回歸，與離散傅利葉變換。本課程著重於使用目前廣泛採用的數值分析開發環境與程式語言，並透過動手練習讓學生體驗數值分析技術在人工智能中的應用。 本課程學生應至少已完成微積分第一年的學生而設計。
description.en: This course introduces the theory, applications, and programming implementation of numerical analysis for science and engineering, including preliminary error analysis, solutions of equations, approximation, differential equations, linear algebra, linear and nonlinear regression, and discrete Fourier transform. Programming implementation is also intensed in the lectures using a current popular development environment for numerical analysis. The application of numerical analysis techniques on artificial intelligence is also introduced with hands-on exercises. This course is designed for engineering majors who have completed at least the first year of the calculus sequence.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以 VLSI 的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路 IC 方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹 2、各式數位訊號架構介紹 3、各式加減乘除法器架構 4、DCT、FIR、MPEG 等架構 5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構 6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

name.zh: VLSI 訊號處理架構設計

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06.
