description.en: The course aims through awareness of cultural economics to interpret the development logic and operating mechanism of cultural economy and to construct a cultural economic knowledge system, and is expected to provide the theoretical basis and thinking coordinates for the development of cultural markets and cultural industries.The main content of the course is economic logics underpinned cultural activities, such as cultural products, cultural business, cultural capital, cultural industries and cultural markets; on the other hand, cultural factors reflected and experienced by economic activities, as well as the value of thinking which plays an important role in economic activities.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含：創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

notes: 經管所、IMBA 和管理博班合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹有效研發 / 創新管理的概念、原則、與標準，這些概念、原則與標準將成為知識密集型的組織與企業的關鍵競爭優勢。本課程將介紹一些相關企業個案和練習活動，用以連結國家、產業和企業的研發或創新活動，並選定方法和工具進行有效的整合功能、企業業務、研發和創新活動。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the concepts, principles, and standards for effective R&D/innovation management that is becoming the critical competitive advantages for the knowledge-intensive organizations and firms. The course will introduce a number of related cases and exercises with a view to bridge the national, industrial and corporate R&D/innovation activities, along with the presentation of selected approaches, methods and tools to effectively integrate functional, business and corporate R&D and innovation activities as a whole.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意包括 10 個數值問題 1. 簡單熱傳導 2. 穩態圓柱熱傳問題 3. 完全展開管流 4. 翼片對流展開管流 5. 理想流體 6. 突然膨脹壓縮流 7. 自由對流完全展開流 8. 軸對稱流 9. 無限反應燃燒流場 10. 亂流流場
description.en: Including ten problems1. Simple pure conduction problem2. cylindrical conduction for steady non uniform k3. fully develop duct4. fin conduction convection for fully develop5. ideal flow6. sudden expansion compressible7. Free convective flow for fully develop8. Axial symmetry flow9. Infinitely combustion reaction10. Turbulent flow

notes: 限 35 人，機電所。製科所。機械外。車輛外生班和機電博含外

description.zh: 1. 橋樑結構分析 2.RC 橋設計 3. 規範闡釋
description.en: Advanced Bridge Engineering 1.Analysis of Structures of Bridge2.Design of RC-Bridges3.Explanation of Specifications

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解？水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的 96 家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解？可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

notes: 日職合開、如在職生沒選修、此課調為星期二 / N56

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解？水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的 96 家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解？可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 隨著科技不斷進步，人工智慧技術逐漸成熟，無論在生產流程、企業管理及分析決策等方面都陸續開始導入生成式 AI 工具，應用場景橫跨企業營運、數據應用以及產品與服務創新等。本課程將介紹生成式人工智慧原理並結合實作方式，透過實際案例和演練來教授生成式 AI 技術和應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的基礎知識，如深度學習、自然語言處理、圖像處理、推薦系統、預測分析等，並導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例。課程中將結合 Azure OpenAI 雲端服務資源，並以人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域，以培育學生具備領先同儕之人工智慧跨域應用專業能力。
description.en: This course introduces the principles of generative artificial intelligence and combines practical exercises regarding the technology and applications of generative AI through real case studies and drills. The course covers fundamental knowledge of AI, such as deep learning, natural language processing, image processing, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and introduces the application cases of AI in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, intelligent manufacturing, among others. The course will also utilize Azure OpenAI cloud service resources and cross-domain application learning mode to cultivate students’ technical abilities in AI cross-domain applications, spanning across data analytics, intelligent computing, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, business forecasting, management, finance, etc., leading them to stand out among their peers.

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧於企業實務之應用
name.en: Application of Generative Artificial Intelligence in Enterprise Practice

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於讓同學們瞭解經營績效評估的方法，強調理論與實作並重。首先會介紹資料包絡分析法 (DEA) 的基本概念，讓同學們對於 DEA 理論有基本的瞭解，接下來再讓同學們學習如何使用電腦套裝軟體進行實際運算，並探討各種企業經營效率分析上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand the methods of business performance evaluation, emphasizing both theory and practice. Firstly, this course will introduce the basic concept of Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA) so that students can understand DEA theory. Then students will learn how to use computer-packaged software for actual calculations and discuss the application of various business efficiency analyses.

name.zh: 企業經營效率分析實作
name.en: Implementation of Business Operation Efficiency Analysis

description.zh: 根據 Kaggle Survey2020（全球資料科學家調查），SQL 在資料科學家使用的程式語言中，排名第二，僅次於 Python。SQL 是用來查詢與操作資料庫的語言，是數據分析與商業智能的重要工具。本課程以 mySQL 資料庫為對象，來學習關聯式資料庫的操作與各種 SQL 語法，它是整體商業智能分析體系的重要技術。在現代商業智慧領域，經常利用 SQL 資料庫、雲平臺和機器學習等新技術，將資料轉換為有用的見解，提出解決方案以改進企業決策，其應用包括零售葉在內的各種經營管理領域。本課程將幫助同學具有 SQL 分析數據的能力，此將有助於後續做好商情預測，提出改善方案以輔助企業能抓住市場脈動，進而分析消費者的需求。
description.en: According to Kaggle Survey2020, SQL ranks second among the programming languages used by data scientists, second only to Python. SQL is a language used to query and operate databases, and is an important tool for data analysis and business intelligence. This course takes the mySQL database as the object to learn the operation of the relational database and various SQL syntax, which is an important technology of the overall business intelligence analysis system. In the field of modern business intelligence, new technologies such as SQL databases, cloud platforms, and machine learning are often used to convert data into useful insights and propose solutions to improve corporate decision-making. It is applied to various business management fields including retail leaflets. This course will help students have the ability to analyze data with SQL, which will help to make good business forecasts in the future, propose improvement plans to assist enterprises to grasp the pulse of the market,

name.zh: SQL 數據分析與商業智能
name.en: MySQL for Data Analytics and Business Intelligence

notes: 經管三四和經管所合開 /  電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP 架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP 訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

notes: 需具程式設計基礎，綜科 327, 限 15 人

description.zh: 1. 寬頻和超寬頻通道模型 2.CDMA 3. 多使用者偵測 4.MIMO 5. 時空傳輸技術 6. 標準中其他無線傳輸技術
description.en: 1.wideband and ultrawideband channel modeling2.code-division multiple access (CDMA)3.multiuser detection4.multiple-input multiple output (MIMO)5.spatial multiplexing/space-time coding and in between6.other transmission technology in standards: OFDMA, UWB, etc.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生藉由瞭解市場定位與策略跟科技產品發展與運用的領域有著密不可分的關係。課程內容主要藉由當前科技產品發展的相關課題，以及整體環境的概述，讓同學對於產業或企業之科技產品市場定位與策略有一基本的認知，提供同學從科技產品、市場定位、管理策略的不同角度瞭解科技產品於市場上定位及推動發展策略。
description.en: This course is closely related to the field of technology product development and application through understanding market positioning and strategies. The course content mainly provides students with a basic understanding of the market positioning and strategies of technology products in industries or enterprises through the current topics related to the development of technology products and an overview of the overall environment, and provides students with different perspectives on technology products, market positioning, and management strategies. Understand the positioning of technology products in the market and promote development strategies.

name.zh: 科技產品市場定位與策略
name.en: Technology Products Market Positioning and Strategy

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study

description.zh: 太空科技應用課程旨在介紹太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，並探討太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的介紹，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
description.en: The Space Technology Application Course aims to introduce the application of space technology in various fields, and explore how space technology impacts human life and scientific research. The course covers topics including space exploration, Earth observation, communication and satellite navigation, space engineering and materials science, space biology and medicine, and space economy and business. Through the introduction of these topics, students will understand the application of space technology in various fields and future development directions, and be able to master relevant technologies and knowledge.

description.zh: 臺灣島位於西太平洋，就板塊構造運動而言，臺灣上新－更新世的造山運動代表歐亞大陸板塊的前緣和其東側以西北方向前進的菲律賓海洋板塊間的衝撞聚合運動。東臺灣花蓮和臺東間的縱谷，已被認為是兩個板塊間的縫合帶和板塊聚合的邊緣。在臺灣的北部，大陸和島弧的碰撞型式可能是菲律賓海板塊向北傾沒到位於歐亞大陸板塊上的琉球島弧系統之下。但是向南沿東臺灣縱谷，在北緯二十四度以南，板塊隱沒方向發生改變，歐亞大陸板塊於此向東隱沒進入菲律賓海板塊之下。此一特殊的板塊背景造就了臺灣多樣的地質現象・本課程之內容主要探討台灣地區 (包括海域) 自中生代至現代的大地構造演變及其地體構造運動、盆地演化、岩石圈的結構及性質、造山運動機制等各種地質現象。希望能藉由瞭解臺灣區域地質，從而作為探討臺灣地質工程與環境領域之基礎・
description.en: Taiwan island is located on the weastern Pacific Ocean. The plate tectonic setting of Taiwan is the convergence and collision between the western Eurasian plate and the easterly impinging Philippine Sea plate on the Pli-Pleistocene. The Longitudinal Valley between Hualien and Taitung in eastern Taiwan has been recognized as the suture zone between these two plates. In northeastern Taiwan, convergence is marked by northward subduction of the Philippine Sea plate beneath the Ryukyu Arc System on the Eurasian plate along the Ryukyu Trench. The subduction polarity changes at 24°N near Hualien in eastern Taiwan. There plate convergence is marked by eastward subduction of the Eurasian plate underneath the Luzon Arc System on the Philippine Sea plate along the Eastern Longitudinal Valley. This distinctive tectonic setting bas brought up various special geologic phenomena on Taiwan The course is aimed at graduate students in the geological engineering, who wish to gain an insight into the s

name.en: Special Topics on Regional Geology of Taiwan

description.zh: 政策研究能檢視理論和實務的切合程度。本課程將帶領大家認識環境政策的經濟分析方法，學習經濟的思維觀點，以及如何運用經濟方法瞭解解決環境問題。除此之外上課內容並與法律結合，探討環境法的經濟分析觀點和傳統思維有何不同，尤其是對環境行為上之改變效果。希望學生能夠具體瞭解經濟分析方法幫助政府解決環境問題及規劃環境政策時所扮演的角色。
description.en: There is a significant trade-off between economic growth and environmental quality.  From this course, students will learn fundamental concepts in Environmental Economics and how to analyze environmental policy issues by using economic tools.  In additions, this course combines economic analysis to law, especially shows students how regulations affect people's behavior.  After this class, students not only know how economic approaches help the government deal with environmental issues and the differences between theory and practices.

name.en: Environmental Economics and Environmental Policies Analysis

description.zh: 政策研究能檢視理論和實務的切合程度。本課程將帶領大家認識環境政策的經濟分析方法，學習經濟的思維觀點，以及如何運用經濟方法瞭解解決環境問題。除此之外上課內容並與法律結合，探討環境法的經濟分析觀點和傳統思維有何不同，尤其是對環境行為上之改變效果。希望學生能夠具體瞭解經濟分析方法幫助政府解決環境問題及規劃環境政策時所扮演的角色。
description.en: There is a significant trade-off between economic growth and environmental quality.  From this course, students will learn fundamental concepts in Environmental Economics and how to analyze environmental policy issues by using economic tools.  In additions, this course combines economic analysis to law, especially shows students how regulations affect people's behavior.  After this class, students not only know how economic approaches help the government deal with environmental issues and the differences between theory and practices.

name.en: Environmental Economics and Environmental Policies Analysis

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助高階管理階層作決策。一般而言，這門課為商學課程中的課程主要協助學員們具有整合能力。學員不只是在策略管理中應活學活用，也融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課將幫助您學習、研讀個案和討論，這是此門課的目標。 1. 瞭解組織所處環境 2. 分析外部環境之時機和危機 3. 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 4. 探討企業不同層次之應對策略。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making at the top management level. Traditionally, this course has been the capstone course in the business program and is taught at the last year of study so that students can integrate functional area knowledge into a coherent one. Students are expected not only to learn a body of knowledge on strategic management, but also to synthesize economics, accounting, and marketing as an aid top management level decisions. We will use a combination of readings, case studies, and lectures to achieve the goals of the course.

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，由組織在經營的關鍵作用，課程中以品牌與組織理論探討品牌行銷與組織策略的重要議題。課程內容包含品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、組織設計、組織權力、組織政治、組織文化。身為公司經營者，面對國際多變化環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷與組織經營決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding marketing and organization strategy as they are used in a wide variety of settings in business markets. The topics covered in this class include: brand equity, brand marketing, brand competition, organization design, organization power, organization polices, organization culture. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand and organization decisions under the internationalized and changeable environment.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含：社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含：社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 國際能源署 (IEA) 呼籲全球國家訂定淨零碳排路徑，國內也啟動淨零目標期程與行動方案，針對建築部門，建築能效評估系統 (Building energy efficiency rating system, TBERS) 為因應亞熱帶氣候與空間複合化、多樣化建築特性所量身訂做的簡易有效評估工具。為使學生培養永續淨零概念並具備建築能效評估計算、評分與標示之技術能力，具體目標如下:。1. 了解國內外淨零碳排路徑策略 2. 評估新建建築、既有建築能效等級 3. 操作新建建築、既有建築之近零設計策略 4. 綜合分析與歸納建築能效機制
description.en: IEA (The International Energy Agency) proposes to set a global net carbon emission roadmap, and domestically launch a net target and action plan, targeting the building sector, the Building Energy Efficiency Rating System (TBERS) a simple and effective assessment tool tailored for subtropical climate and spatial complex and diverse building characteristics. This course aims at develop the concept of sustainable net zero and have the technical ability of building energy efficiency assessment calculation, scoring and marking, the specific goals are as follows:1. Understand domestic and foreign net zero carbon emission path strategies2. Evaluate the energy efficiency rating of new buildings and existing buildings3. Operate the nearly-zero design strategy of new buildings and existing buildings4. Conclude the analysis and induction of building energy efficiency mechanism

description.zh: 本課程在使學生了解各種不同的資訊科技 (Information Technology) 與管理資訊系統間的關連性，並結合金融企業導入產業議題，實際應用所教授的 IT 技術進行學術研究。藉由 IT 技術的應用演練，讓學生將實際進行問題分析、模型發展、系統開發、模擬實驗及最後的研究結論與模型驗證。提升學生獨立思考與解決問題之能力，培養科學的態度與學術研究的知識。
description.en: This course is to enable students to understand the relationship between various Information Technology and management information systems, and cooperate with financial companies to introduce industrial topics, and actually apply the IT technology taught for academic research. Through the application and exercise of IT technology, students will actually carry out problem analysis, model development, system development, and simulation experiments. At last, students can summarize research conclusions and model validation. Thus, students can improve their independent thinking and problem-solving ability, and further cultivate their scientific attitude and academic research knowledge.

name.zh: 金融教育分析與邏輯思維
name.en: Financial education analytics and logical thinking

notes: 資財三四甲乙和資財所合開 / 先鋒 603

description.zh: 物聯網系統包含了感測器與感測網路，邊緣閘道，雲端服務與存取裝置，可建構眾多的端到端商業應用包含無人商店與智慧支付的場景金融，遠距醫療與照護，智慧製造與智慧家庭等。本課程將教授物聯網系統的設計包含裝置與服務的技術，並以各項商業應用場景做課題的探討。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) system encompasses sensors and sensor networks, IoT gateways, cloud services, and mobile devices, enabling the development of numerous end-to-end business applications, including scenarios such as unmanned stores, and intelligent payment in the financial sector, remote healthcare and caregiving, smart manufacturing, and smart homes. This course will teach the design of IoT systems, including device and service technologies, and explore various business application scenarios as topics of discussion.

name.zh: 物聯網系統設計與商業應用
name.en: IoT System design and Business Application

notes: 資財四甲乙和資財所合開

description.zh: 瞭解資料庫安全運作基本概念，熟悉資料庫系統安全各項技巧，奠定學生學習分散式動態資料庫系統之管理與安全能力。並配合範例及實務演練，培養實際進階應用能力。
description.en: Understand the basic concepts of database security operation, familiarise yourself with database system security techniques, and lay the foundation for students to learn the management and security capabilities of distributed dynamic database systems. And cooperate with examples and practical exercises to cultivate advanced practical application ability.

notes: 資財三四甲乙和資財所合開

description.zh: 本課程希望讓學生了解如何正確選擇與使用多變項統計方法，並能閱讀、呈現與解釋多變項統計報告或結果。課程包括因子設計、實驗設計、共變數分析、複迴歸等主題，以探討教育研究中多重且同時的影響因素。
description.en: This curriculum lets students understand how to choose and use multi-variance statistics methods exactly.  It also includes that reading, presenting and explaining the report or result of multi-variance statistics analysis exactly.  The topics of the curriculum include that factor design, experimental design, covariance analysis, and multi-regression, al etc. to explore the influence of multi and simultaneous factors in the educational research.

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒 (10-12) 之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類，尤其著重在光纖短脈衝雷產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝寬度與相位量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的各種應用包括光譜量測、泵 - 探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to relative short pulse below one picosecond, ultrafast lasers have been widely used in various fields including military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kinds of the ultrafast lases, especially on the principle of mode-locked fiber generation, pulse compression technique and the method of the ultrashort pulsewidth measurement as well as phase retrieval.  Various applications of ultrafast laser including fluorescence, pump-probe and nonlinear optical measurement have also been introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 介紹新興生醫產業的趨勢與其跨領域之特性。課程內容含：生醫產業簡介，新世紀人類基因體大計畫，微生物工程新應用，新型蛋白質藥劑之開發，分子醫療診斷之革新，生醫產業之電腦新科技，遠距醫療服務新模式，創新健康管理與保險制度的創新，生醫產業與科技法律，生醫產業與社會倫理，幹細胞新產業，組織再生新產業，超級老鼠的誕生，美美的生醫美容，抗癌症研究之新科技，抗傳染疾病之新科技。評分的方式以學生報告為主。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of biomedical industries in the new millennium. The course covers areas such as human genome project, biotechnology application with microbes, new protein drug, innovative medical technology, computation biology in biomedical industries, new business models in telemedicine, health care management and innovative insurance trends, technology laws in biomedical industries, social responsibility and biomedical industries, stem cell technology, new industries from tissue engineering and so on. The grading method of the course is based on the oral and written reports.

name.zh: 新世紀生醫產業創新科技
name.en: Innovative biomedical industries in the new millennium

description.zh: 隨著跨學門的多元連結，當代建築學的設計與史論研究向度越趨廣泛且複雜。為回應此變動的條件，研究方法作為知識體系建構的工具，亦需重新思考如何提供理解當代建築學和認識論的新興維度。因此，本課程首先以「研究為一門藝術的概念」- 透過理解自身意識與研究的關係，作為開啟研究的初步引導。接著，將從人文社會科學研究方法的基礎出發，探討如何在建築學門內適切轉化及運用此些方法。透過本課程，學習者將能夠有效辯證和梳理不同研究主體 (知識論) 以及該研究所對應之方法邏輯 (方法論), 並以此作為設計研究的基礎建構。同時，期待學習者能夠理解在建築研究中，學門的部分特殊性質所衍伸出的方法論修正，並鼓勵為當代建築設計與史論研究提供新的思路。
description.en: With the growing interdisciplinary connections, contemporary architectural design, theoretical research, and historical dimensions have become increasingly expansive and intricate. In response to these evolving conditions, research methods, as essential tools for constructing knowledge systems, need to be reconsidered in order to offer fresh insights into understanding contemporary architecture and its epistemology.This course starts by embracing the concept of "research as an art" as a foundational guide to initiate research, emphasizing the crucial relationship between self-awareness and the research process. It then builds upon the established research methods in the humanities and social sciences, exploring how to effectively adapt and apply these methods within the field of architecture. Throughout the course, learners will learn to skillfully articulate and organize diverse research subjects (epistemology) and their corresponding methodological frameworks (methodology), estab

name.zh: 建築設計與理論研究方法

notes: 甲組學生必修，甲組老師共授

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

notes: 電資資安、創新資安 合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1. 電磁波在介質中的傳導 2. 光纖光學 3. 光纖種類及特性 4. 發光器 5. 接收器 6. 中繼站及光放大器 7. 光纖通訊系統 8. 光纖網路
description.en: 1.Electromagnetic ware propagation in media 2.Fiber optics 3.Characteristics of optic fibers 4.Optical emitter 5. Optical receiver 6.Repeater and optical amplifier 7.Optical fiber communication 8.Optical fiber network

description.zh: 現代人工作壓力大，許多上班族都有壓力、失眠、焦慮等問題。醫學也發現，身體許多疾病甚至癌症也都和情緒、壓力有關。目前，已經證實正念減壓：可以降低壓力與焦慮，疲勞，降低員工的職業倦怠程度和離職率。提升睡眠品質，增強孼疫系統，提升專注力，提高領導效能，提升大腦功能與創造力，促進幸福感。滿意度，情緒管理能力、創造力、與人際溝通能力，提高工作績效。改善了個人健康、工作與家庭生活！因此，目前歐美和國內的各大企業紛紛引入正念課程，以提高員工和企業績效。
description.en: There are so many people with the high stress in the workplace. It’s demonstrated that practicing mindfulness can bring improvements in both physical and psychological symptoms as well as positive changes in health, attitudes, and behaviors. The advantages of integrating mindfulness in the workplace including:higher brain functioning;reduced work-related stress, anxiety, depression, fatigue, and psychological distress .Improves job performance, greater job satisfaction, and decreasing turnover and burnout.

name.en: Mindfulness for Leadership and Stress Reduction

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，星期六 234，台北集中上課，USR 計畫

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.zh: 創業 0 到 2 的思維與實作

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各 20 位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

description.zh: 課程將以體驗式教學訓練，提升學員表達技巧、舞台技巧、臨場反應。本課程主要目的在教授學生以設計思考思維與策略，運用主題式課程實戰小組簡報及個人簡報，快速釐清簡報製作及表達過程中重點，提升修課學員個人簡報製作能力及表達能力，幫助學生在未來創業及就業上以出色之個人簡報能力獲得面試者及投資者的青睞，領先於起跑點取得優勢。
description.en: The course will use experiential teaching training to improve students' expression skills, stage skills, and on-the-spot reactions. The main purpose of this course is to teach students establishing design thinking strategies. During the course practice group presentations and personal presentations training students to quickly clarify the key points in the process of presentation production and presentation, to improve the students' personal presentation production and presentation skills. Furthermore, assist students' entrepreneurship and employment in the future. Students who finished this course will be favored by interviewers and investors with his excellent personal presentation skills. And he will gain an advantage over the starting point.

name.zh: 企業最愛：高質感簡報溝通力
name.en: Corporate's Favorite: High-quality Communication and Presentation Ability

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

name.zh: 創業講座 — 創業是一場馬拉松
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- The persistance that makes the great entrepreneur

notes: 經管系所和創創合開，密集授課

description.zh: 輔具是輔助器具的簡稱，舉凡日常生活，能使活動更容易、方便的各種用具皆屬之，正確的使用輔具可以改變身心障礙者或老年人原本有障礙的生活，走入社會，降低社會成本。本課程為專案導向課程，課程中除教授輔具設計基本概念，透過實際個案訪談分析目標對象，以工作坊形式找出使用者痛點，進而發展解決方案，提出適切的輔具資源，以幫助身心障礙者或老年人族群。
description.en: Assistive device is the abbreviation of auxiliary equipment. For everyday life, all kinds of utensils that make activities easier and convenient belong to it. Correct use of assistive device can change the life of people with physical and mental disabilities or the elderly who have obstacles, and enter the society and reduce Social costs. This is a project-oriented course. The course introduces the concept of auxiliary equipment; students can also analyze target audience through different case studies. During workshops, it helps students indicate users’ pain points and develop the solutions. The goal of this course is to come out with the resources to help people with disabilities or the elderly.

description.zh: 衛星科技與工程導論的課程將介紹衛星系統及次系統基礎知識，以培養具有從事衛星任務設計之基礎能力。課程內容包括：衛星基本原理，衛星設計與製造，衛星運行與維護，衛星通訊與遙測應用，衛星發展趨勢。
description.en: The course "Introduction to Satellite Technology and Engineering" will introduce the basic knowledge of satellite systems and subsystems to cultivate the fundamental abilities needed for designing satellite missions. The course content includes: the basic principles of satellites, satellite design and manufacturing, satellite operation and maintenance, satellite communication and remote sensing applications, and satellite development trends.

name.en: Introduction to Satellite Technology and Engineering

notes: 余憲政 副主任 (太空中心)

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.
